Name: 1st District
Description: A commercial and industrial district, with a mix of residential areas and businesses.

Name: 2nd District
Description: A predominantly residential area with a growing number of local shops and services.

Name: 3rd District
Description: A mixed-use district with a focus on small industries and residential housing.

Name: 4th District
Description: An area known for its proximity to public transport links, providing easy access to other parts of Athens.

Name: 5th District
Description: A quieter district, mainly residential, with schools and green spaces.
